__e: Uh... well, darn it, you know he looked kind of sick to me so I thought... I'd just take him down to the vet and fix him up a bit.
He was having an affair with the vet's wife and he was carrying on with someone else's daughter.
Her father is a vet and she has a 17-year-old brother.
And yesterday, the vet told me That there's nothing i can do for him.
And the vet said it was time. And so from half a world away while my mother held the phone to his ear I said goodbye to my dog in seven languages.
The vet just said that he has some sort of bug and to let him be until it passes.
